note.p: Death: The Rookery, Downe, Kent (21 September 1922)
Education: Trinity College, Dublin. MA; ScD

Career: Assistant to George Francis Fitzgerald (FRS 1883); Lecturer in Experimental Physics, Trinity College, Dublin (1901-1902); Quain Professor of Physics, University College, London (1902-1914); died of a lingering disease (contracted in 1912)
Obituaries: Proc Roy Soc Series A 1926 vol 110 pp iv-ix, plate, signed by A W P
